definition: variant of 稱|称[cheng1], to weigh
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer

sentences.english: The two weights counterbalance each other.
The propagation and cultivation of endangered plant-Sinojackia xylocarpa Hu in Beijing area was investigated from 2004 in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 總結了2004年至今，作者對秤錘樹的研究概況。
